properties.entry: SELECT ANIMAL_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, ANIMAL_NAME, GENDER, NEUTRALIZATION, ANIMAL_AGE, ANIMAL_WEIGHT FROM ANIMAL_INFO JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE ANIMAL_NO IN (SELECT ANIMAL_NO FROM INTEREST_LIST WHERE USER_NO = ? AND TYPE = 'A')
SELECT PRODUCT_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE FROM PRODUCT JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO IN (SELECT PRODUCT_NO FROM INTEREST_LIST WHERE USER_NO = ? AND TYPE = 'P')
SELECT COM_NO, USER_NO, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, COM_TITLE FROM COMMUNITY WHERE USER_NO = ? AND COM_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COM_NO, USER_NO, CREATE_DATE, COM_TITLE, COUNT FROM COMMUNITY WHERE USER_NO = ? AND COM_TYPE = 2 AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT COM_NO, USER_NO, CREATE_DATE, COM_TITLE, COUNT FROM COMMUNITY WHERE USER_NO = ? AND COM_TYPE = 3 AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT ANIMAL_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, ANIMAL_NAME, GENDER, NEUTRALIZATION, ANIMAL_AGE, ANIMAL_WEIGHT FROM ANIMAL_INFO JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY ANIMAL_NO DESC
